Milestone (alternative versions): The Contracting Officer Representative submits the requisition cover sheet [alternative: submits the cover sheet] to the Office of the Chief Financial Officer.
The Office of the Chief Financial Officer approves the requisition.
The [program office] assigns a Contracting Officer.

Milestone: Acquisition package completed and submitted for review
Milestone (alternative versions): The Contracting Officer Representative completes and submits the acquisition package.

Milestone: The procurement office and legal team review the acquisition package.

Milestone (alternative versions): The procurement office puts the contract out to bid. Alternative: The procurement office shares the contract with eligible vendors. Alternative: The procurement office collects bids from eligible vendors.

Milestone: Proposals from vendors ready for review
Milestone (alternative versions): The Contracting Officer reviews proposals from vendors. Alternative: The contracting office reviews vendors' proposals.
A technical evaluation panel chooses the most qualified vendor. OR The program office chooses the most qualified vendor.
The program office approves the vendor and awards the contract. OR The program office awards the approved vendor a contract.
The Contracting Officer Representative holds a kickoff with the vendor.
The [title] closes out the contract. Alternative: [Title] officially closes the contract.
